title: Crash in LoL and not just that. Help from an expert please?
body:
Recently I have been unable to play most of the things I want in my brother's pc.
The pc is fairly old (8-9 years old) a Toshiba, Pentium(R) Dual-Core CPU T4200 2.00GHz 2,00GB RAM.
Until recently, the pc has been having strange pink screen flicking crashes.
I have been playing LoL for over 6 months, it had happened before for a short period of 2-3 days and then went back to normal.
The pc doesn't overheat, as it had it's insides fully cleaned up by someone who knows about this stuff.
It's been happening with some other games, can anyone try and help me? Not a walkthrough or anything, just give me some hints?

replies.body: Hmmmmm that flickering pink screen sounds pretty troubling. From your description, it doesn't sound like this is just happening in League, so I'd suggest doing some general pc maintenance to make sure everything is running alright. This honestly sounds like it's related to your graphics card, so I'd start there.
